评论详情: Algunas son frágiles y se rompen, pero el precio es razonable. Algunas se pueden ajustar y no manchan los dedos.
I like the variety in this pack. The ones I’ve worn so far have been comfortable to wear. They’re pretty and fun, and I feel like the price is pretty good.

评论用户: My daughter loves the variety. It will match whatever outfit she wears. She loves each of them. She had received so many compliments

评论概述: Cool rings in the Hot Topic style
评论详情: 11 year old loved these rings. Good variety of costume jewelry in a Hot Topic style look.
This pack is very cute and ok quality. I’ve been wearing them for a couple of days and haven’t had any issues yet.
Great assortment I absolutely adore the trendy styles this store offers.

Nice set for the price!  Rings are various sizes with some adjustability.  Mostly suited for pre-teens/teens so my girls got some cute pieces out of this.  Quality is pretty decent as well so I was pleasantly surprised!

评论概述: Better quality than expected for the price
评论详情: These Drperfect 13 PCS Y2k Rings are adjustable and fit as wide range of finger sizes. The metal is thicker than expected. They aren't the cheap "gumball" quality that I thought they were. Very cute and durable. Great value.
These are a cute set of rings. They are fun rings mostly suited to teenagers which is who I got it for.

Pleasantly shocked at the quality of these rings, I was expecting flimsy metal but these ring bands are sturdy and resize well. The gems are a little wonky, but expected for something like this.  Giving 4 stars because of the amount of plastic the rings are packaged in. Each ring was individually packaged in a baggie, then put into a larger baggie, then zipped in a black bag. Waste of resources in my opinion, wish they could find a better way to package.
The rings come in assorted sizes which is nice and they also can be adjusted to bigger/ smaller sizes. Super cute.
I can probably say half are usable for an adult but thats 6 so the others are ok for kids not to little though. I do recommend this item for the value but expect to get some useless pieces.
